entry.title: 快速容器
entry.content:
来自遥远过去的遗产。

栈：

#include <stdexcept>

template <typename T, long long sz=100000> class fstack {
    private:
        T *storage;
        long long ptr;

    public:
        fstack() {
            ptr = 0;
            storage = new T[sz];
        }

        ~fstack() {
            delete[] storage;
        }

        bool empty() const {
            return ptr == 0;
        }

        bool full() const {
            return ptr == sz;
        }

        long long size() const {
            return ptr;
        }

        void push(const T &elm) {
            if (full()) {
                throw new std::overflow_error("stack overflow");
            }
            storage[++ptr] = elm;
        }

        const T &top() {
            if (empty()) {
                throw new std::underflow_error("stack underflow");
            }
            return storage[ptr];
        }

        const T &peek(long long down) {
            if (ptr - down < 0) {
                throw new std::underflow_error("stack invalid argument");
            }
            return storage[ptr - down];
        }

        void pop() {
            if (empty()) {
                throw new std::underflow_error("stack underflow");
            }
            --ptr;
        }

        void pop(T &receiver) {
            if (empty()) {
                throw new std::underflow_error("stack underflow");
            }
            receiver = top();
            pop();
        }

        void clear() {
            ptr = 0;
        }
};

队列：

#include <stdexcept>

template <typename T, long long sz = 100000> class fqueue {
    private:
        T *storage;
        long long w_ptr, r_ptr, len;

    public:
        fqueue() {
            w_ptr = r_ptr = len = 0;
            storage = new T[sz];
        }

        ~fqueue() {
            delete[] storage;
        }

        bool empty() const {
            return len == 0;
        }

        bool full() const {
            return len == sz;
        }

        void push(const T &elm) {
            if (full()) {
                throw new std::overflow_error("queue overflow");
            }
            w_ptr %= sz;
            storage[w_ptr] = elm;
            ++len;
            ++w_ptr;
        }

        void pop(T &receiver) {
            if (empty()) {
                throw new std::underflow_error("queue underflow");
            }
            r_ptr %= sz;
            receiver = storage[r_ptr];
            ++r_ptr;
            --len;
        }

        void clear() {
            len = r_ptr = w_ptr = 0;
        }
};

双端队列：

#include <stdexcept>

template <typename T, long long sz = 100000> class fdeque {
    private:
        long long len;
        long long front;
        long long rear;
        T *array;

    public:
        fdeque() {
            array = new T[sz];
            len = 0;
            front = 1;
            rear = 0;
        }

        ~fdeque() {
            delete[] array;
        }

        void clear() {
            len = 0;
            front = 1;
            rear = 0;
        }

        bool empty() const {
            return len == 0;
        }

        bool full() const {
            return len == sz;
        }

        void push_front(const T &elm) {
            if (full()) {
                throw new std::overflow_error("deque full");
            }
            front = (front - 1 + sz) % sz;
            array[front] = elm;
            ++len;
        }

        const T& front() const {
            if (empty()) {
                throw new std::underflow_error("deque empty");
            }
            return array[front];
        }

        void pop_front() {
            if (empty()) {
                throw new std::underflow_error("deque empty");
            }
            front = (front + 1 + sz) % sz;
            --len;
        }

        void pop_front(T &receiver) {
            receiver = front();
            pop_front();
        }

        void push_back(const T &elm) {
            if (full()) {
                throw new std::overflow_error("deque full");
            }
            rear = (rear + 1 + sz) % sz;
            array[rear] = elm;
            ++len;
        }

        const T& back() const {
            if (empty()) {
                throw new std::underflow_error("deque empty");
            }
            return array[rear];
        }

        void pop_back() {
            if (empty()) {
                throw new std::underflow_error("deque empty");
            }
            rear = (rear - 1 + sz) % sz;
            --len;
        }

        void pop_back(T &receiver) {
            receiver = back();
            pop_back();
        }
};

entry.title: 配对堆
entry.content:
来自遥远过去的遗产。

#include <stdexcept>
#include <vector>

template <typename T> class pairing_heap {
private:
  struct pair_node {
    T element;
    pair_node *left_child, *next_sibling, *prev;

    pair_node(const T &elm) {
      element = elm;
      left_child = next_sibling = prev = nullptr;
    }
  };

  pair_node *root;

  void compare_and_link(pair_node *&first, pair_node *second) {
    if (second == nullptr) {
      return;
    }
    if (second->element < first->element) {
      second->prev = first->prev;
      first->prev = second;
      first->next_sibling = second->left_child;
      if (first->next_sibling != nullptr) {
        first->next_sibling->prev = first;
      }
      second->left_child = first;
      first = second;
    } else {
      second->prev = first;
      first->next_sibling = second->next_sibling;
      if (first->next_sibling != nullptr) {
        first->next_sibling->prev = first;
      }
      second->next_sibling = first->left_child;
      if (second->next_sibling != nullptr) {
        second->next_sibling->prev = second;
      }
      first->left_child = second;
    }
  }

  pair_node *combine_siblings(pair_node *first_sibling) {
    if (first_sibling->next_sibling == nullptr) {
      return first_sibling;
    }
    static std::vector<pair_node *> tree_array(5);
    register long long num_siblings = 0;
    for (; first_sibling != nullptr; ++num_siblings) {
      if (num_siblings == tree_array.size()) {
        tree_array.resize(num_siblings * 2);
      }
      tree_array[num_siblings] = first_sibling;
      first_sibling->prev->next_sibling = nullptr;
      first_sibling = first_sibling->next_sibling;
    }
    if (num_siblings == tree_array.size()) {
      tree_array.resize(num_siblings + 1);
    }
    tree_array[num_siblings] = nullptr;
    register long long i = 0;
    for (; i + 1 < num_siblings; i += 2) {
      compare_and_link(tree_array[i], tree_array[i + 1]);
    }
    register long long j = i - 2;
    if (j == num_siblings - 3) {
      compare_and_link(tree_array[j], tree_array[j + 2]);
    }
    for (; j >= 2; j -= 2) {
      compare_and_link(tree_array[j - 2], tree_array[j]);
    }
    return tree_array[0];
  }

  void reclaim_memory(pair_node *t) {
    if (t != nullptr) {
      reclaim_memory(t->left_child);
      reclaim_memory(t->next_sibling);
      delete t;
    }
  }

public:
  typedef pair_node *position;

  void make_empty() {
    reclaim_memory(root);
    root = nullptr;
  }

  pairing_heap() { root = nullptr; }

  ~pairing_heap() { make_empty(); }

  position insert(const T &x) {
    pair_node *new_node = new pair_node{x};
    if (root == nullptr) {
      root = new_node;
    } else {
      compare_and_link(root, new_node);
    }
    return new_node;
  }

  bool empty() const { return root == nullptr; }

  const T &find_min() const {
    if (empty()) {
      throw std::underflow_error("PairingHeap Underflow");
    }
    return root->element;
  }

  void delete_min() {
    if (empty()) {
      throw std::underflow_error("PairingHeap Underflow");
    }
    pair_node *old_root = root;
    if (root->left_child == nullptr) {
      root = nullptr;
    } else {
      root = combine_siblings(root->left_child);
    }
    delete old_root;
  }

  void extract_min(T &min_item) {
    min_item = find_min();
    delete_min();
  }

  void decrease_key(position p, const T &new_val) {
    if (p->element < new_val) {
      throw std::invalid_argument("PairingHeap new_val larger than oldVal");
    }
    p->element = new_val;
    if (p != root) {
      if (p->next_sibling != nullptr) {
        p->next_sibling->prev = p->prev;
      }
      if (p->prev->left_child == p) {
        p->prev->left_child = p->next_sibling;
      } else {
        p->prev->next_sibling = p->next_sibling;
      }
      p->next_sibling = nullptr;
      compare_and_link(root, p);
    }
  }
};

根据 Data Structures and Algorithm Analysis in C++ (Fourth Edition) 整理得出。
